name: Demigod: Alpha Squad
description:
This is a wave defense RTS that I’ve been working on. In the future I’ll be implementing VR support (hopefully within the next few months!), but for now remains a flat game.

This game is set in a universe I’ve been designing this past summer on one of the ‘Nine’, a group of agricultural planets on the edge of human-controlled space 200 years in the future, just after first contact with an unknown alien threat. Assume control of Alpha squad during their last moments and defend against wave after wave of alien adversaries.

This game is still in a very early pre-alpha (heck, it’s just a single scene with two enemy types) and it will be improving a lot over the course of development. I hope you like what you see! Any and all feedback is welcome.

—THE CONTROLS—

WASD/Arrow Keys: Move camera view

Right Mouse Button: Rotate camera view

Left Mouse Button (drag): Move a single character

If you want to support this project (and others like it) you can do so here.
